title: How to Be Your Dog's Best Friend
creator_credit: Video Media Production, Royal Society for the Prvention of Cruelty to Animals (Australia) and Bernard Thompson
brief_description: Dog ownership can be a great joy. However, it is also a great responsibility. This video presents a wide variety of expert information presented in a simple format designed to help you become your dog’s best friend and to help you increase the joy of dog ownership; choosing your dog, bringing your dog home, toilet training, health and happiness, veterinary advice, dog behaviour. Rated: G
